song_lyrics: Pāmyā pāmyā re bhavjaḷ pār, Shrī Hari sant maḷī
Vāmyā vāmyā re dukh apār, Shrī Hari...
Jāmyā jāmyā re sukh urmāy... Shrī Hari
Saryā saryā re sarve kāj... Shrī Hari 1
Bharyā bharyā re abhare ābh... Shrī Hari
Tharyā tharyā re pāmī sukhṭhām... Shrī Hari 2
Līdho līdho re pūraṇ lhāv... Shrī Hari
Dīdho dīdho re jam shirpāv... Shrī Hari 3
Thaī thaī re jagmā jīt... Shrī Hari
Gaī gaī re anynī pratīt... Shrī Hari 4
Bhāvyo bhāvyo re sācho satsang... Shrī Hari
Nāvyo nāvyo re abhāv ang... Shrī Hari 5
Mohyu mohyu re man joī Nāth... Shrī Hari
Proyu proyu re chitt eh sāth... Shrī Hari 6
Huvo huvo re jay jay kār... Shrī Hari
Juve juvo re sukh apār... Shrī Hari 7
Sahe sahe re koṇ dukh dvandv... Shrī Hari
Kahe kahe re Nishkuḷānand... Shrī Hari 8
title: Pāmyā pāmyā re bhavjaḷ pār

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-639: Sadguru Nishkulanand Swami

Category: Prapti ne Mahimana Pad
